properties.description:
Over the last 45 years, PFC cases have been used by hundreds of American manufacturers to package and protect more than 5,000 different products. Now, with the introduction of our new AllConditions™ weather-resistant cases, retail consumers can take advantage of our years of experience and buy protective cases direct to meet their own individual needs.

At PFC, we do everything here in the U.S – design, mold engineering, and manufacturing. We source our materials domestically, we don’t subcontract work to other companies, and we don’t outsource anything to foreign manufacturers.
properties.address: 20 S Bradley Rd, Woodbridge, CT 06525, USA
properties.title: Manufactured
